name: url-shortner-service
description: ``` User stories: 1) User Story: I can pass a URL as a parameter and I will receive a shortened URL in the JSON response. 2) User Story: If I pass an invalid URL that doesn't follow the valid http://www.example.com format, the JSON response will contain an error instead. 3) User Story: When I visit that shortened URL, it will redirect me to my original link. ```
